nodes.title: Neon Database
nodes.desc: A fully serverless, PostgreSQL-compatible database service that scales automatically to handle changing workloads. [neon.tech](https://neon.tech/)

nodes.title: Cloud-Native
nodes.desc: Designed from the ground up to take advantage of cloud computing, providing scalability, reliability, and cost-effectiveness. [aws](https://aws.amazon.com/cloud-native/)

nodes.title: Globally Distributed
nodes.desc: Available in multiple regions, allowing for low-latency access and compliance with data sovereignty regulations. [neon.tech](https://neon.tech/global-distribution/)

nodes.title: Cost-Effective
nodes.desc: Provides a cost-effective solution for database management, with a pay-as-you-go pricing model. [neon.tech](https://neon.tech/pricing/)

nodes.title: Monitoring and Logging
nodes.desc: Offers integrated monitoring and logging capabilities, making it easier to troubleshoot and optimize database performance. [neon.tech](https://neon.tech/monitoring-logging/)

nodes.title: Backup and Recovery
nodes.desc: Provides automated backup and recovery options, ensuring business continuity and minimizing data loss. [neon.tech](https://neon.tech/backup-recovery/)

nodes.title: Integration with Popular Tools
nodes.desc: Supports integration with popular tools and frameworks, such as AWS Lambda, Apache Kafka, and TensorFlow. [neon.tech](https://neon.tech/integrations/)

nodes.title: Support for Multiple Programming Languages
nodes.desc: Compatible with multiple programming languages, including Python, Java, and Node.js. [neon.tech](https://neon.tech/languages/)

nodes.title: Serverless Architecture
nodes.desc: No need to provision or manage servers, allowing for reduced administrative burden and increased focus on application development. [serverless](https://serverless.com/)

nodes.title: PostgreSQL Compatibility
nodes.desc: Supports standard PostgreSQL drivers and tools, making it easy to migrate existing applications. [postgresql](https://www.postgresql.org/)

nodes.title: Automatic Scaling
nodes.desc: Dynamically adjusts to changing workloads, ensuring optimal performance and minimizing costs. [aws](https://aws.amazon.com/autoscaling/)

nodes.title: High Performance
nodes.desc: Optimized for low-latency and high-throughput, making it suitable for demanding applications. [neon.tech](https://neon.tech/performance/)

nodes.title: Security and Compliance
nodes.desc: Implements robust security measures and adheres to industry standards, such as SOC 2 and GDPR. [neon.tech](https://neon.tech/security/)

nodes.title: Real-time Data Processing
nodes.desc: Supports real-time data processing and analytics, enabling applications to respond quickly to changing conditions. [neon.tech](https://neon.tech/real-time-data-processing/)

nodes.title: Data Warehousing
nodes.desc: Suitable for data warehousing and business intelligence workloads, providing fast query performance and efficient data storage. [neon.tech](https://neon.tech/data-warehousing/)

nodes.title: Machine Learning
nodes.desc: Supports machine learning workloads, enabling applications to integrate predictive models and AI-driven insights. [neon.tech](https://neon.tech/machine-learning/)
